participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and adventurous, Emily is passionate about literature and enjoys sharing her knowledge with others. She is optimistic and eager to explore new experiences.
participant_1.background: My major was american literature and education. On weekends I like to go hiking. I just graduated college. I want to teach kids in elementary school. I live in a big city.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Analytical and creative, Michael enjoys problem-solving and is passionate about technology. He is friendly and enjoys sharing his experiences with others.
participant_2.background: I am a software engineer. I started at google on an internship. My favorite seafood is lobster. I work at google. I live in seattle.

content.text: Hi! I just graduated from college and I'm looking for a job.
Congratulations! What did you study?
I studied American Literature and Education.
Cool! I'm a software engineer at Google.
Oh, cool! I've always been interested in coding.
It's a lot of fun. I'm originally from Seattle, but I moved to the Bay Area for work.
That's awesome! I just moved to San Francisco after I graduated.
Nice! I love living in the Bay Area. It's so beautiful here.
It is! I love the hiking trails.
Me too! I go hiking every weekend.
That's awesome! I'm looking forward to getting into hiking more.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
Yeah, I've heard that.
So, what are you looking for in a job?
I'm not sure yet. I'm open to anything, but I'm really interested in teaching.
That's great! I know a few people who teach elementary school.
Oh, that's awesome! I'd love to meet them.
I'm sure they'd love to meet you too. I'll send you their contact information.
Thank you! That's really helpful.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
Me too!
